sentence.Network_en: The only verdict is vengeance a vendetta held as a votive not in vain.

sentence.Network_en: V : The only verdict is vengeance, a vendetta, held as a votive not in vain.
sentence.Network_cn: 唯一的结论就是复仇, 一种仇恨, 作为一种虚无的奉献.

sentence.Network_en: Inside Saint - Sulpice , Silas carried heavy iron votive candle holder from the altar back toward the obelisk.

list.abs: ...反之则称为,小弥撒曲,missa lecta,以特殊目的的进行奉献的活动中演唱的弥撒曲称为,奉献弥撒曲,votive mass,在没有朗诵也不举行仪式而只有歌唱的弥撒活动中演唱的弥撒曲称为,音乐会弥撒曲,concert mas.
votum（L.）：誓愿。同 vow。votive Mass：还愿弥撒；随意弥撒；任选弥撒；特别敬礼弥撒。vow：许愿；誓愿；愿：是向天主慎重而自由地所做之承诺，以虔敬的态度去实践一件可行、而更好的善事（法.
（七）还愿祭（votive offering）；（八）甘心祭（free-will offering）；（九）赎罪祭（sin offering）；（十）赎愆祭（guilt offering）…
你需要一根绿色的许愿蜡烛(Votive Candle)、橄榄油(不一定是初榨的，平常食用那些也可以）、一撮罗勒(Basil)、牙签。在你的魔法 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin votivus, from votum (see vote). The original sense was 'expressing a desire', preserved in votive Mass

means.word_mean: 1. dedicated in fulfillment of a vow;
